Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Listeria monocytogenes, Clostridium sporogenes, Brochothrix thermosphacta, Lactobacillus fermentum, Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. Bulgaricus. Inmost other Lactobacillus species.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Acidocin B is active against Listeria monocytogenes, Clostridium sporogenes, Brochothrix thermosphacta, Lactobacillus fermentum and Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus, but inactive against most other Lactobacillus species.

Literature.Title: Genetic analysis of acidocin B, a novel bacteriocin produced by Lactobacillus acidophilus.
Literature.Author: Leer RJ, van der Vossen JM, van Giezen M, van Noort JM, Pouwels PH.
